title: Clash winners
body:
Is there anyway to find out who all the clash winning teams were last night? 

Would be cool to know and possibly play some flex matches against eachother some time. 

Let me know if you were a winning team and if you wanna play vs my team. Would be cool.

replies.body: I mean custom matches against eachother, not flex lmao mb
me and you should be trying to get to plat XD
my team won but I guess we wouldn't be interested in custom games...
There is a Tab in the client under Clash called Winners, You can see all the teams that won from there
I looked at that. It says no teams found. I figure something must be wrong with it
it was working yesterday, but now it doesn't display anything
